org.logicmill.util.concurrent

Class SegmentIntegrityException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.logicmill.util.concurrent.SegmentIntegrityException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BucketOrderException, EntryCountException, EntryNotReachableException, IllegalBucketValueException, IllegalOffsetValueException, NullEntryInBucketException, WrongBucketException, WrongSegmentException

    public abstract class SegmentIntegrityException
extends java.lang.Exception
    An abstract base class for exceptions thrown by ConcurrentHashMapAuditor.verifyMapIntegrity(boolean, int), to indicate detection of a structural anomaly. SegmentIntegrityException encapsulates identification of the segment in which the anomaly was observed (common to all subclasses).
    Author:
    David Curtis
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
